response.original_title: [Restricted Account Recovery Tips →] Why Is My Uphold Account Frozen?
response.overview: If your Uphold account is frozen, don’t panic.  (1)(833)-(644)-(5290)↪ Accounts are usually frozen for security reasons, unusual activity, or incomplete verification.  (1)(833)-(644)-(5290)↪ To unfreeze it, log in and (1)(888)-(574)-(7167)↪ check for any notifications or emails from Uphold that explain the issue. Make sure all identity documents are submitted and verified.  (1)(833)-(644)-(5290)↪ If the problem persists, contact Uphold Support  (1)(833)-(644)-(5290)↪ directly through their help center or live chat.  (1)(833)-(644)-(5290)↪  Follow their instructions carefully to restore access and avoid future freezes,  (1)(833)-(644)-(5290)↪  such as updating personal information and securing your account with two-factor authentication (1)(833)-(644)-(5290)↪  .
response.title: [Restricted Account Recovery Tips →] Why Is My Uphold Account Frozen?
